snippet: The former middleweight champion Kelly Pavlik has been indicted on felony charges in Ohio after being accused of shooting a man with a pellet gun.
abstract: Kelly Pavlik, former middleweight boxing champion, is indicted on charges that he shot man with pellet gun, which is felony in Ohio.
lead_paragraph: The former middleweight champion Kelly Pavlik has been indicted on felony charges in Ohio after being accused of shooting a man with a pellet gun.

headline.main: Ex-Champion Kelly Pavlik Indicted in Ohio
